title: Sovrintendente (Sergeant)
description: Escort of prisoners and detainees - Reporting activity - civil protection, rapid interventions for natural disasters (earthquake, floods, etc.) in order to provide humanitarian aids to the population - Instructor of Nuclear, Biological, Chemical, Radiological Defense - Escort of suspected, arrested and supporters of Football Teams (close protection service) – Head of Document Management Office (Database Input activity) - Responsible of the Human Resources Office – Team Leader in the Public Order Service – Territory Control Responsible – Responsible of anti uprising and riot management. These experiences were acquired at managerial and supervisory level (from 6 to 30 police officers supervised). Responsabile servizi di scorta di vip e personalità politiche anche straniere, deportazione di immigrati clandestini, scorta tifosi e detenuti - Istruttore Difesa N.B.C.R. - Responsabile dell'Ufficio Risorse Umane - Capo Squadra nei servizi di Ordine Pubblico - Capo squadra nei servizi di protezione civile, interventi rapidi in caso di situazioni di emergenza e disastri naturali (terremoti, alluvioni, tempeste di neve, ecc.) al fine di fornire aiuti umanitari alla popolazione.

title: Border Monitor (Special Adviser)
company: EULEX mission in Kosovo - European Union
description: Monitoring activity of the border crossing point in Kosovo, on the legal basis local gouvernment using the experience and knowledge of best European practices on an operational basis in cooperation with Kosovo Police. Official relationships established with the counterparts involved to the Border Crossing Point (K-For contingent, Kosovo Police, UN Liaison Office in Belgrade, Kosovo Customs, Serbian Officers, etc.). Daily, weekly and monthly reports as established from the EULEX Programmatic Approach System. Intelligence Activity respecting the rules established by the Chain of Command. Assessment of the efficiency of KP Officers with specific evaluation reports, even with reference to the Rank held and the Training achieved. Assessment of the logistic situation of the Kosovo Police located to the Border Line (buildings, facilities, supplies, vehicles, equipment, etc.) with specific evaluation report. Monitor, Mentor, Advisor of KP Border Police. Evaluation, through specific reports, of the performance achieved by Kosovo's Border Police Officers related to border crossing procedures e.g. vehicle checks, VIN number checks, document checks. Checking of arrests and detentions of suspects, to ensure compliance with appropriate European standards.
name: Alessandro NANNI

title: Vice Sovrintendente (Deputy Sergeant)
company: Polizia di Stato - Frontiera Aerea Aeroporto di Fiumicino
description: Head of Document Management Office- Head of Escort for VIP, deported, illegal migrants, arrested (close protection service) - Head of Police Operational Room – Reporting activity – Intelligence Researcher (Database Input Activity). Chief of border police office to the Airport (Passport Control, observance of Schengen Treaty and International Law, Intelligence) – Criminal Investigations - passport control (research of passports and visas fake) – chief of the passenger control service (X ray machine, metal detector, etc.) – baggage control (research of arms, explosives, etc.) – cooperation with intelligence organizations (CIA, italian intelligence services, etc.) – chief of security service for the risk flights (El Al, American companies, etc.) – Patrolling and surveillance activity. These experiences were acquired at managerial and supervisory level (from 10 to 35 police officers supervised) Responsabile servizi di scorta riguardanti VIP, Immigranti espulsi, detenuti - Capo Ufficio in turno della Polizia di Frontiera (trattamento pratiche di respingimento, trattamento pratiche di adozione ed esportazione di armi, investigazioni su traffico di esseri umani e documenti falsi, controllo rispetto norme internazionali sui diritti umani e sul trattato di schengen) - Responsabile della Squadra Investigazione - Attività di intelligence - Responsabile dei servizi di sicurezza aeroportuale (sia nell'aerostazione sia nella pista di atterraggio e decollo) riguardante soprattutto i voli a rischio di El Al e compagnie americane - Responsabile controlli di sicurezza su passeggeri e bagagli (sistema ai raggi X, metal detector) nonché attività di sorveglianza dell'intera aerostazione per la ricerca di eventuali terroristi, criminali, bagagli ed oggetti sospetti.
